1.content:
Scott had been driving for hours and hadn't seen a single vehicle on this stretch of highway. The sun had gone down hours ago and feeling tired he had stopped at a gas station to fill the tank and get a coffee. If the caffeine wouldn't keep him up, it's horrible burned flavor would. His destination was still several hours away. Providing his rebuilt head gasket held up he would be arriving early that morning. He sighed, he needed some music. He received nothing but static from the radio, the high mountains blocked out the radio transmissions. Fumbling blindly in his arm rest compartment he pulled out a tape, a moment later an 80's rock tune began to play. At least now the ride would be tolerable.

A flash of light from his left caught his attention. Lightning? This time of the year? Last time he'd checked it hadn't even called for rain. There was another flash. Maybe it was ball lightning. A third Flash. Was it just him or did it look like it was getting close---

FLASH!!!

"What the hell?!" Scott cried out as a bright flash engulfed the car and temporarily blinding him. Swerving he felt the road become rougher. Thinking he was going off to the side of the road he slammed on his breaks and came to a complete stop. It took a few minutes for his vision to clear and as it did Scott noticed something was amiss. It was daytime now, that was Impossible. So was the sight before him. He stared out through his windshield for several moments, then looked at his coffee wondering if it had been spiked with something. Putting his car in park he shut the engine down and got out to get a better look at his surroundings.

As impossible and incredible as it seemed he was

Scott's heart was beating so loud he was sure the giant would somehow hear it. He was petrified. He didn't even know if the giant spoke English, let alone if he'd be nice enough to not squash him into a pulp. He didn't even know where he was. He knew that his chances of surviving this situation were remote at best. He just wished it hadn't been so sudden. Not 20 minutes ago he'd been driving back from his trip.

Scott breathed deep and tried to calm himself - panicking wasn't going to help anyone. And eventually he got what he wanted; more earthquakes. The giant was walking away and the door opened as he left. Scott breathed deep and started looking around the car. There was nothing - no sign whatsoever of the force that had taken him here, wherever "here" was. He shook his head, patting himself down. Maybe something in his pocket, or under his seat.

Nope. Nothing. What the hell?

Tears sprang to Scott's eyes. How could this have happened to him? Was he stuck here forever?

Taking a few minutes to wallow in his misery, Scott realised that if he wanted to go home he would need some help. He needed to find out what had happened and figure out a way to make it happen again, or reverse it, or something. If this were, say, a parallel universe or another world, he figured that maybe a physicist would be the best way to go. But it could take forever to find one, one he knew he could trust, and one with the knowledge to help him. Would they have internet in this world? Or a yellow pages or something he could use to find a scientist? Or maybe he could take his chances with the inhabitants of this house.

Starting the car up again he maneuvered it just so he faced the bedroom door. He'd just shut the car off again when the door opened and he saw a pair of bare feet as the teen boy stepped into the room. With the click of a light switch the room was filled with light. Scott watched as he shut the door behind him and jumped onto the bed. The rumble that was made shook the car, had he not been strapped in a seat belt Scott would've been knocked out of his seat. A rather scary situation. He heard the TV come one followed by sound from a game console.

Scott wondered what to do.
11312.title: Pair of boxers (Older teen boy)

choices: Go rub the boy's feet
Drive the car up toward the boy's face
Something else
113121.content:
Scott felt like he had no other option. He didn't want to get stepped on by this giant teenager. He had to get his attention, he had to climb up onto the bed to the boy.

Scott drove the car to a part of the sheets that were on the floor. Due to his tiny size, Scott thought that the sheets could actually support the weight of the car, so he drove the car up the sheets and it worked! Scott made it on top of the bed in no time and was now sitting in front of the largest pair of feet he'd ever seen. The were huge! They had to be as big as a normal building in a city!

Scott wondered how he was going to get this boy's attention. What did he decide to do?
113121.title: Climb up onto the bed

choices: Bra (older girl)
Panties (girl)
Sock (either male or female)
1132.content:
The closet was equally messy as the rest of the room. Scott parked the car beneath a drawer and started climbing up. No point in staying on the floor. It also helped that the closet had wire drawers that easily lent themselves to hand and footholds. But it appeared that the drawers contained only socks and underwear, in no particular order. As he looked up, Scott saw towers of folded shirts and pants resting on shelves above the drawer.

Just then, he heard someone enter the room. A white, damp towel fell on the floor, in view of the closet door. Scott panicked and dove into the nearest pile of clothes, instinctively hiding from the giant. Unfortunately for him, the behemoth had just finished a shower, and was looking to put on some clothes from the closet. Scott only realized his mistake when the ______ he was in was lifted up and brought to the body of the unaware teen.
1132.title: Toward the Closet

choices: The Foot lifted away. She's going to bed.
The Foot lifted away, She felt something.
The toe stopped pressing down. A chance to escape!
1133.content:
As he maneuvered the car around various objects he couldn't help but think how insane the whole situation was. Was Rod Serling suddenly going to show up and start talking about him and the Twilight Zone? It really looked to Scott that this was exactly what had happened. When he had made it under the desk he shut the car off and got out. From there he had a better view of the Bedroom. The closet door was opened and he could see a dress hanging among other articles of clothing. So this room belonged to a Teenage Girl. A messy one from what he could see, which wasn't what he'd expected, Every Teen Girl he'd ever know always had a clean room, almost to the point where it was an obsession for some of them. Suddenly he felt a tremor through the floor. Weak at first, but growing steadily stronger. He knew what that was, he'd seen enough Godzilla movies over the years to know that it was the footfalls of something enormous coming his way. Without wasting any time he jumped back into his car, turned the ignition and--

The engine refused to turn over.

"No, No. You gotta be freak'n kidding me!!" said Scott in disbelief. His disbelief would only grow as the door slowly swung open and a Giant stepped into the room. The first thing he saw was a pair of really nice feet. More than nice, in his eyes they were perfect. He followed the feet up the legs of her PJs, up her chest to her face. He didn't recognize her, and he didn't expect to. Her blue eyes matched the straight shoulder length blond hair, she had a round face and a cute turned up nose. She closed the door and walked toward the computer desk.

FOOM!

One huge foot slammed down in front of the car as she settled into the computer chair. It had been so close that Scott was lifted out of his seat. He heard her sigh high above him. It was slightly echoy. Probably from the acoustics of the room itself. He watched the toes wiggle in front of him with fascination. It was true that he had a thing for feet, but that wasn't the only reason to stare. There was so much detail, he could see the Demerol ridges on every toe, every wrinkle of that wide sole. It was really quite beautiful, he wondered what a foot that big would feel like. As if to answer his question the huge foot slid forward, the toes lifted slightly off the ground and the big toe that was twice as big as the silver Malibu settled down on top of it. He heard a Bang as the front shocks broke under the tremendous weight. The windshield glass cracked down the middle as the pad above pressed down. The metal roof groaned but for the moment held. Then, the pad began to move as the Teen Girl began to unconsciously rub her toe over the car.

Despite the fact the car was in park, it rolled forward and back with the foot. Something on the Transmission broke and the front tired popped under the weight of the flesh above. Scott doubted very much if this young giantess could've heard it from under her foot, not with the sound from the Computer fans, or the conversion she was having with someone on Skyp. Suddenly the glass of the side windows exploded out ward as the roof began to collapse under the enormous weight. Instinctively Scott crouched down onto the floor of the car as the windshield spider webbed and popped out of its frame. Scott cried out as the huge toe pressed down all around him for a moment more until....
1133.title: Under the computer desk

choices: Beth places both feet on either side of Scott
Scott is crushed underfoot
Beth Stops and notices the car.
Beth Stops and notices Scott
Scott is Pinned under Beth's foot.
114.content:
It was a little girl's room. No question about it. Pink wallpaper, Girl toys piled neatly in a toy box, a small table and chairs with stuffed animals and a tea set. He heard something from above.He suddenly realized he'd been standing next to a rather large bed. His heart skipped a beat as the other occupant of the room sat up and pulled the covers off herself.

Dressed in aPJs, four year old Beth yawned and rubbed the sleep out of her eyes. She was only three feet tall but to Scott she might as well be three Hundred. Sure Science had long ago said that nothing built like a human being could get that big, but those who decided that weren't here looking at the not so little girl who was swinging her cute feet over the edge of the bed fast before Scott had anytime to react.
114.title: Not Alone in the Room

choices: Under the bed again.
To the tea set.
Out of the room, following Beth.
An Older boy enters the room (Beth's older Brother)
Beth's Mom enters the room
1141.content:
Scott's eyes darted from side to side as enormous bare feet landed on either side of him, the ground bouncing and rumbling beneath him. He began to tremble as the titanic child walked away, her pudgy feet making booming noises as her towering form drifted into the distance. Her ginger hair bounced a little with each step she took. He was left speechless as the lilac pajama-clad titan left.

* * *

Beth yawned again as she wandered downstairs, the girl smiling contently to herself as she went to the dining room.

* * *

Scott's eyes darted around the pink room, before he headed back to his car. He didn't plan to be here for that long, the girl had almost squished him, and he assumed she'd be back. He got in, planning to drive...
1141.title: Beth places both feet on either side of Scott

choices: Stay in Beth's room
Head for Door #1
Head for Door #2
Head for Door # 3
Someone is coming up the stairs
11411.content:
Scott drove until he was certain he couldn't be seen. Then he shut the car down and began to shake uncontrollably. He had almost died. Death by giant child foot.

He closed his eyes and could still see the foot in vivid detail. The flat sole, the cute toes, everything.

He wasn't a drinking man, but he sure wished he had one right about then. He breathed deeply, trying to calm himself down. it might've been minutes, maybe hours, but he finally stopped shivering. His hands still shook but he could live with that for the moment. He had bigger things to deal with, like what to do next.

So here he was. Tiny as a bug in a car that was the size of a Hot Wheels, in the bedroom of a "Little" girl that happened to be hundreds of feet tall. And all he had for survival with was what he had in the car. He considered trying to get the girl's attention, but would a child so young understand him or would he be viewed as a weird bug or plaything? Then he thought if there was a child, there had to be a parent. Or an older sibling. Maybe he could try to get help that way. But the reaction might be the same.

Another thought occurred to him. whatever he decided to do, he would have to do it without his car. While traveling by vehicle was faster it wasn't built for all surfaces. It barely drove over carpet. The thought of venturing out in this giant world terrified him. But what choice did he have? Taking a deep breath to calm his nerves, Scott stepped out of his car and opened the back trunk.

He wished he had more resources, but in actuality he had almost nothing. A flashlight, a first aid kit, and assorted tools. He stuffed the first aid kit in his back pocket and put the flashlight into his inside coat pocket.

It took twenty minutes to travel from under the child's bed to the opened door of the bedroom. Scott peered out into the hallway. He would have to stick close to the wall if he had any chance. To his left the hallway ended with a flight of stairs, from what he could see. To his right were a series of doors.
11411.title: Under the bed again.

11412.content:
Looking around frantically for a place to hide and gather his thoughts scott notices the perfect place in the bottom part of a shelf with only some smaller objects around, not taking any more time to wait around scott puts the car into drive and speeds towards the shelf.
Pulling up on the side of the shelf scott gets out of the car not bothering to close the door and pulls himself up and onto the lowest level of the gargantuan shelf, deciding to get further away from the edge he climbs onto what seemed to be a tray and looked around.
Suddenly the ground started to vibrate slightly signalling to scott that the 4 year old giantess would be returning soon, feeling exposed in the open Scott decides to climb the strange round structure that towered over him.

As he rounded the top he looked over his shoulder paying no mind to where her was going as he looked for signs of Beth returning, suddenly he leans forwards to the next part of the structure but nothing is there and he falls forwards into the large round structure.
Suddenly the vibrations get more violent just when they stop, Scott feels a rising feeling as he's lifted up towards the titanic 4 year old's tea table, there is a clunking sound as the tea set is set down onto the table.
In that moment the unaware beth opened the top of the tea kettle to pour warm water in and then dropped a tea packet in before closing the tea cup, at that moment the realization dawned on Scott that he was inside a giant tea kettle floating in tea and panick set in.
Thrashing wildly Scott tried to climb towards and out of the nozzle of the tea kettle, but due to the steep slope and slippery water aswell as his decreasing stamina Scott stood no chance.

After a while of essentially mixing the water Scott was forced down under the water as Beth lifted the tea kettle up to pour her morning cup with a smile eager to wash down her breakfast.
Gravity turned sideways as Scott was poured out of the kettle and directly into the young giantess' cup, sloshing in the brown liquid he barely had time to breath before he was submerged in the tea.
Scott managed to reach the surface before his lungs burst but was met with the terrifying sight of Beth looming over him as she poured her cup blissfully unaware that she was about to eat a man barely a fraction of her size, he desperately tried yelling out to her for help but as she set the kettle back down it was evident that his pleas fell upon deaf ears.

Once again Scott was filled with the familiar sensation of being lifted upwards as Beth raised the cup towards her mouth, staring upwards scott saw the lips draw closer until the top one towered over him as Beth took a sip.
This was it, this was the end for Scott he concluded mesmerized by the sight of the colossal 4 year old sipping her tea, was this his destiny, to live his whole life just to be swallowed by Beth the aluf 4 year old titaness?
The gods seemed to answer as Scott was drawn into the torrent and sucked into the awaiting mouth, he fell onto Beth's toungue helplessly as her cute morning breath washed over him and his heart sank.
All of a sudden the light from behind him was cut off as Beth's plush lips closed and her rough toungue began to savour her tea and by extention Scott, this is all he was now, tea, a tiny morsel for a colossal girl, his only purpose to fill her stomach, once again the gods agreed as Scott was pulled towards and over the cliff of her toungue and down her throat.
There was no turning back and Beth echoed that as he splashed into her stomach, but Scott knew that from the start, all this time he was meant for something and this was apparently it, he layed backwards on the slimy substance mixed with tea thinking his last thoughts before he was dissolved and broken down to become part of Beth.
Every part of him would be dissolved and reallocated to another part of the growing four year old giantess, he was becoming part of something greater...
11412.title: To the tea set.

choices: Beth picks up the car
Scott puts the car into reverse
11413.content:
39 Kilometers an hour.

That's how fast Scott was clocking this Young Girl in PJs who he was following walking down this Hallway. A young girl who was hundreds of feet tall and walking 39 KM an hour. To put that into perspective, the average man can run 45 KM and hour. Still faster then the giant kid, but a man as small as Scott would've tired out very quickly. She could overtake him easily if he wasn't in a car. As it was, he was able to keep up with her. Granted the floor shaking with every footfall was a bit unnerving. Even with the windows up, the sound of her bare feet slapping on hardwood was loud.

Suddenly she stopped. Scott slammed on the brakes. He watched as Her head cocked to one side, then she turned around.

Beth frowned. She thought she had heard something. A little whining noise. She looked behind her down the hallway to her bedroom but she didn't see anything. Then she noticed something just in front of her. She smiled. A Toy Car!

Scott knew he was in trouble the moment he saw recognition in the girls eyes and the smile that formed on her face. Faster than he had expected she was there reaching down with a pudgy hand big enough to grab three Malibu's easily.
11413.title: Out of the room, following Beth.

choices: Told her mother about the Toy Car she found
Placed the Toy Car in her pocket
Examined the Toy Car some more
114131.content:
Huge pudgy fingers closed around the car before Scott had a chance to do anything. Soft flesh molded around metal and pressed around the glass. He heard a giggle from above as the car was lifted skyward so fast that Scott's ears popped.

Beth held the "Toy Car" close to her face. It felt warm, there was a vibration that tickled her fingers, and there was a sound coming from it. There was also smoke coming out from the back. She sniffed it and frowned Eew, it smelled bad. She pressed the tip of her index finger over the place the smoke was coming out of. The noise and the vibration stopped. Did she turn it off? She tried to turn it on again but nothing happened. A bit of the back where she had pressed pushed in, but nothing else happened.

Scott swore silently as the engine cut out and the back bumper crumpled under the tip of the index finger. He wasn't sure he could start the car again. Not that it was a good idea at the moment anyway. The Fingers closed around the car again and the child was on the move again. through cracks between the massive digits he could see she was heading down a flight of stairs. The hand swung freely and it felt like he was on a fair ride. Good thing he had stayed buckled in.

Beth walked into the kitchen and saw her Mother. She could smell Pancakes cooking in the pan. Sitting down at the table she--
114131.title: Beth picks up the car

choices: Stay in the car
Escape the pocket
Try to get the girl's attention
Too late Beth's hand returns
1141312.content:
Scott's world became a chamber of pink fabric as the not so little girl placed the car in her pocket. Well that's just great. What a mess he was in. From beyond the walls of the pocket he could hear the sounds of chewing and a woman's voice telling the girl not to eat so fast. He wondered what the hell he was going to do next.

His car may start up again, but he couldn't go anywhere so long as he was in the clutches of that child. Staying inside might buy him some time but he couldn't be sure he'd stay safe. He could leave the car and climb out if there, that would also be dangerous as he could be mistaken for a bug. His only other option was to get this young girl's attention and hope to heck she'd be willing to help. He wasn't counting on it, this kid was probably four or five. What would a kid that age do with an ant size man? He didn't want to know. Maybe he didn't have much of a choice either.

"Scott old boy, you are so f'n screwed." He finally said to himself.

He said behind the wheel of his car and giving it some though he decided that the best course of action would be to
1141312.title: Placed the Toy Car in her pocket

choices: Scott manages to hang on
Scott Falls back into Beth's lap
Scott falls into Beth's plate
Scott falls to the table
11413123.content:
"This is a bad idea." Scott muttered to himself. He was standing on the PJ covered left leg of the four year old who's name he'd yet to know. Above she was happily eating her syrup dripping pan cake, slowly as her mother had instructed. Was he really going to try to climb her? He would've preferred to try to get her mother's attention. Far better to deal with an adult than a child of such a young age.

Shaking his head, he picked a spot where the fabric of the PJs were the most wrinkled and began climbing. It wasn't as easy as it was portrayed on Saturday morning cartoons. Without climbing gear and dealing with cloth that looked to be made from rope it was making slow progress. As he climbed up the not do little girl's stomach he could here her digestive system already at work breaking down her meal. It made him feel uncomfortable and so he continued on. It was when he had passed the stomach area that it really became hard. It was almost vertical by the time he reached her chest.

For her part, Scott's climb went unnoticed by Beth who was paying more attention to her breakfast than who was climbing up her chest. She had blond hair, like her mother, and it hung shoulder length. It was that hair the tiny man has aiming for.

Scott was nearing exhaustion by the time his hand closed around the closest strand of hair. About an inch and a half thick the strand was covered in a film that would make climbing difficult. 'Great' he thought 'As though I didn't have enough to deal with.'

He inched his way up the strand of hair. His goal of course was the girl's ear. If he could get there, there was a slim to none chance that he could be heard. After that he had no idea what was going to happen. Everything seemed to be going along just fine until he heard.

"Would you like another pancake sweety?"

The child's head suddenly turned to the direction of the voice and the hair he was hanging onto swung outward.
11413123.title: Try to get the girl's attention

1142.content:
There was no time to react, no time to regret, hell Scott's life didn't even flash before his eyes like they often did in stores he'd read. Within a matter of seconds the Child's foot was ontop of him. He caught a glimps of five pudgy toes and a flat sole before he was pressed into the carpet. Soft skin molded around him for a split second before the air was forced out of his lungs and everything went away.

Beth might've heard the small crunch, might've even felt something go crunch under her foot, might've even felt bad for doing it, had she not been half asleep. Instead she yawned, wiggled her toes and padded out to the kitchen for pancakes. Most of Scott remained crushed into paste in the carpit was was vacumed away hours later. What remained on the bottom of Beth's foot remained there until her bath. She'd found his car after breakfast and tried to play with it until she broke it. That too ended up in the garbage. There was nothing to indicate that he'd lived at all.
1142.title: Crushed underfoot

1143.content:
Beth climbed out of bed and rubbed the sleep from her eyes. She was about to leave to have breakfast when her eyes fell upon something silver on the floor. With the curiosity of youth she picked it up. A toy car. Where did it come from? She didn't own it.

For Scott it was a sight he'd never forget as the pudgy fingers wrapped around a two ton car and lifted it up skyward. That was his car, not only that it had everything he needed to have a change at surviving this place. Without thinking he cried out in protest. He never would've thought he'd get a reaction but the "little girl"'s head suddenly swung in his direction and her blue eyes focused on him.

"Little Man!"

The girl's other hand was upon him and Scott found himself pressed into flesh so hard that the air was pushed out of his lungs.

Beth opened up her hand and looked at her prize. It was a little man. She had caught a little man. Her child mind didn't question it, just accepted it. She studied him, as she did so she dropped the toy car which broke into pieces. She heard the little man say something but she couldn't make it out. With her other hand now free she picked the little man off her palm and held him between her thumb and forefinger. The little man cried out which made her giggle.

"Little man." she whispered and gave him a kiss. She padded out of her bedroom and headed to the kitchen.

"MOMMY MOMMY!"

"Good morning dear."

"Look what I found." Beth held up the little man she had found.

"Oh, you found your new pet, dear."

'Pet?' Scott thought. 'Did she just say "PET"!?'

"Be careful with your pet, dear. Daddy brought him all the way from earth."

"Oh, can't i play with him, Mommy?"

"After Breakfast , dear."

The Mother listened to the barely audible sounds being made by the tiny man being held by her daughter "I think he likes, you dear."

His fate sealed, Scott's was doomed to be the pet of a giant girl.
1143.title: Beth Stops and notices the car.

choices: Beth Finds her mother in her bedroom
Beth Finds her mother in the kitchen
Beth walks into the living room and is distracted by cartoons
Beth's older brother walks out of his room
Beth's Older Sister walks out of her room.
1145.content:
Within a matter of seconds the Child's foot was on top of him. He'd caught a glimpse of five pudgy toes and a flat sole before he was pressed into the carpet. Soft skin molded around him for a split second before the air was forced out of his lungs.

Beth yawned, wiggled her toes and was about to pad out to the kitchen for pancakes when she noticed something under her right foot. Glancing down she curiously lifted her foot away. Stars sparkled in Scott's vision as he breathed again. lying flat on his back he looked up, the "little girl"'s blue eyes focused on him.

"Little Man!"

Pudgy outstretched fingers reached for him and Scott found himself pressed into flesh so hard that the air was pushed out of his lungs.

Beth opened up her hand and looked at her prize. It was a little man. She had caught a little man. Her child mind didn't question it, just accepted it. He was waving his arms. She heard the little man say something but she couldn't make out all of it. She did however hear the word "Help." She liked helping. Beth nodded. She would help. With her other hand she picked the little man off her palm and held him between her thumb and forefinger. The little man cried out which made her giggle.

She made out another word "Mommy" Beth nodded again. He wanted her to take him to her mother. She walked out of her room and into the hallway and sought out to find Mommy. All the while the little man she held hung on for dear life.
1145.title: Scott is Pinned under Beth's foot.

choices: 6 or 7
115.title: Hey, trucks! (little boy's room)

choices: Mark jumps back, shocked.
Mark reaches for you, eager to examine this toy.
Mark crushes you; he thinks you're a bug.
1151.content:
The trucks are almost normal-sized vehicles for you. If they were real, you figured you could drive them. Walking forward, you place your hand against the yellow Tonka truck.

How can this be real? You think to yourself.

It was then that you begin to feel light bumps; they became heavier as whatever it was grew closer to you. Just as the thumping began to give you a headache, they stopped.

Then, you heard a voice, "I thought I put all my army men away."

Oh, fuck...

Turning around, you look up into the face of a little boy. He looked to be about six, and he was enormous! Sitting cross-legged only a few feet away, he gazed down upon you.

"Hi," you say, waving bashfully.
1151.title: Mark, the six-year-old.

choices: Mark wants to play
Mark becomes not so nice
11512.content:
The boy gasped with shock he heard the tiny man respond and wave back to him.

"U-um... hey there.." Scott stuttered awkwardly as he stared back at the boy's stunned expression.

"Coooooool!!" The boy oo'd as he began to reach towards the little talking toy.

"Uh..Oh! Um! No! Wait!! Hey! I uh!" Scott couldn't managed to find the words as he watched the boy's massive open palm begin to encompass him; the kids excited smile clearly visible between his the giant fingers as they closed in.

There was no point running. Even if the man had a head-start, the boy could easily just walk over and snatch him up, regardless of how much distance he created between them.

Scott felt the heat radiating off the boy's palm as he was pressed into it from behind. The giant's tough leathery fingers pressed against his back as his face was smothered into the soft warm surface of the boy's flesh.

Unable to breath for a few moments, Scott began to panic, wriggling frantically before the pressure around him finally let off.

Panting and on his knees, Scott's stomach dropped as he realized he was now being held high off the ground in front of the young boy's enlivened face.

"I don't remember having a toy like you before!!!" The boy's eyes glimmered as he stared the tiny man in his palm.

Scott's heart nearly skipped a beat the moment he heard the boy label him with the word 'toy'.

"H-hey! W-wait no! I'm not a toy! I'm an actual person!"

The young boy looked confused for a moment as he heard the man's odd response.

"Hahaaa!.. No waaay! you're way too small" The boy giggled as if having heard an amusing joke.

Scott nearly fell over as the boy's hand shook slightly.

"It's true! I used to be normal sized, just like you! Even bigger!" Scott frantically tried to convince the boy.

There was a long pause as the boy simply stared back with a blank expression.

…..
...

"Wait...... Really?...." The boy's words trailed off as his eyes widened with disbelief; he could tell the tiny man wasn't joking.

"Yeah, I was just driving on a road somewhere and I somehow ended up in your room like this!" Scott decided that honesty would probably be the best approach now that the boy seemed to finally understand his situation.

"Wooooow, how did you get so small?" The curious six year old brought the man up to his face to get a closer look.

"I don't know I just suddenly woke up here."

“What's your name?” The boy asked.

“My name's Scott”

“My name is Mark!” The six year old yelled back excitedly, now knowing the name of his new little friend.

“Haha...., nice to meet you Mark...” Scott replied timidly in reaction to the giant boy's terrifying abundance of energy.

“Oh!...Um...Do my parents know about you??” The boy asked with a sudden whisper.

“What?.... No...... At least I don't think so. Could you bring me to them? They should be able to help me!”

There was an odd pause as the boy seemed to become lost in thought.

“Uh.. Mark?” Scott felt an uneasiness as the six year old seemed to contemplate the request.

“Um.. okay..” Mark muttered distantly with a noticeable tone of disappointment. The boy tried to hide it, but he was clearly a bit conflicted; here he thought they were about to have so much fun too.

Mark nodded his head as he began to stand up. The boy felt compelled to do what Scott asked of him; regardless of the man's size he was still an adult.

“O-Okay, I'll go find my mom” Mark responded as he carefully closed his hand round the man.

Walking out of the room, the boy headed across the hall and down the stairs.

As Mark walked into the kitchen, he was met with the sound of dishes being washed. The boy's mother stood in front of the sink cleaning various dishes.

“M-Mommy?” The boy muttered in a subdued voice.

“What is it honey” The woman asked as she continued washing at the sink.

“I uh, I found ..uh.....something in my room”

“What did you find honey?” The woman replied

“Uhh...” The boy opened his hand and stared down at the tiny man in his palm.

Already listening to the conversation from within, Scott was happy to watch the fingers around him uncoil, allowing him to get some much needed air.

The man stared up at the boy, who seemed hesitant to answer his mother as he stared downward.

“I uhhh. I found uh...” Mark's heart began to race.

The woman began to pull off her gloves, signaling that she was finished with the dishes.

Just as he saw his mom beginning to turn, Mark suddenly snapped his fingers closed again.

“What did you find honey?”

“Uh........................... a quarter!” The boy lied innocently.

“Oh...that's great honey! You should save it for when we go shopping haha” The woman smiled as she left the boy alone in the kitchen.

Realizing he had actually gotten away with the sudden lie, Mark's heart began to settle.

As he began quickly walking back towards his room, Mark could feel tickling sensation of the tiny man struggling inside his closed fist; Despite feeling a pinch of guilt, the boy couldn't help but reveal a naughty smile .
11512.title: Mark reaches for you, eager to examine this toy.

11531.content:
*quick note. The Character of Kyle is the same Character in this Interactive and is used with permission.
http://www.writing.com/main/interact/ite...


Scott parked the car and stepped outside. If he were dreaming, this was the most vivid dream he'd ever had.

Despite the colossal scale of everything there was no question he was in a Boy's room. It was a bit untidy, but then he recalled his own room but being very clean at that age either. Making sure the car was out of sight , he ventured across the messy floor of the room. He could've drove the car, it would've been faster, but he was in an exploration mood.
