She is in shock when she looks around, and notices that she seems to be surrounded by green grass, which is as tall as she is, maybe even taller. The girl quickly examines herself for any injuries, and finds none. She then looks at her driver’s side window for any cuts, and sees nothing. The unharmed girl is now standing next to her damaged car, as she decides what to do next. Christy realizes that her car is now totaled, so she tries her cell phone to get some help. However, she cannot get any connections at all. So she reluctantly decides to go into the weird looking forest to find some help. As the girl walks through the strange looking forest, she hears splashing nearby. Christy carefully goes over to investigate, and comes across a lake. To her delight, she sees a handsome naked white boy around her own age swimming around in the nude, and she likes what she sees.

………………

As Scott swims around in the water, the completely nude 18-year-old boy turns around to see a gorgeous teenage girl who is around his own age, and height, maybe slightly shorter, grinning at him, while hiding behind some tall looking grass. Still floating around in the water, Scott admires her beauty from afar, which causes him to have an erection. He can see that the girl has a well-defined, athletic, yet curvy body. The girl also appears to have a fine ass, from what little he could see of it. He smiles back at her, and playfully waves at her. Scott watches as Christy does what next?
124.title: Scott meets Christy!

choices: They see a giant adult human nearby?
They see a giant anthro furry creature nearby?
They see a giant animal or alien creature nearby?
1241.content:
Christy watches as the cute, friendly nude boy in the distance waves at her to come on into the water. She is about to yell “No thanks,” to him, until she looks closer and discovers that the boy looks strangely familiar to him. Then it dawns on her who the boy is. She knew him as Scott and they used to go to the same high school together. They were even a couple at one time, dating for two years, until her father broke them apart last year over religious concerns. Christy’s father is an extremely religious, conservative man, and he strongly disapproved of Scott’s family joining a more liberal church nearby. After the couple was forced to breakup publicly, they still managed to date behind her dad’s back. Christy who still has strong romantic feelings towards Scott smiles at him, and begins to undress herself.

Scott smiles back at the distant girl, when he finally recognizes who she is, and his romantic feelings for her begin to overpower him, as he watches her undress. Both Scott and Christy are thankful they are both eighteen now, because there is nothing Christy’s father can do about it. Christy removes all of her clothing, and places them on a large rock for safekeeping. Scott smiles as his former girlfriend jumps into the water, and swims towards him in the nude. The tiny nude couple finally came together in the lake, and they begin to play in the water. Meanwhile, some more wind blows over her clothes, pick them all up, and blows them away, just like Scott's clothes. The naked young couple is unaware that their clothes are all gone, as they swim around playfully in the lake together.

As they innocently swim in the water, the tiny couple sees something huge moving through the sky, and it lands near the edge of the lake, out of the water. When it crash lands they swim over to investigate it, and Scott is shocked to see that this object is his own car, that abruptly explodes. As they watch all of Scott’s belongings going up in flames, they see another object meeting a similar fate, falling through the sky, and landing just a few feet away from the blazing remains of Scott’s car. Christy is now in a state of shock, when she realizes that the second object is her car, which quickly catches fire. As all of the couple’s belongings, and their two cars burn to a crisp, the scared couple swims back to shore. At the same time as they both emerge nude from the water, the scared couple quickly looks around for their clothes, but finds nothing. The tiny naked couple is naturally alarmed by this situation, when they hear some loud noises moving around nearby. The still wet, tiny naked couple hides behind a large rock, peeks around it, and to their horror, they see a giant what nearby?
1241.title: The tiny naked couple swims around.

choices: The shoes are all different sizes and styles. (A communal family closet.)
The shoes are all the same size, but different styles. (A young woman's closet.)
The shoes have enormous signs hanging off of them. (A shoe store.)
The shoes are tattered and worn, some barely holding together. (A junk closet)
13.content:
Scott stared up at the impossible sight. He was looking at a black wall as tall as he, into which an enormous red pillar was fixed, which stretched at least a hundred feet into the air, where it supported a black ceiling, one which rapidly swept down back to the ground. Beyond, an identical pillar supported an identical ceiling.

He was standing in the shadow of enormous, high-heeled shoes. His car sat beneath them, the size of a matchbox car -- if that.

He turned around, and soon saw that there were more shoes, several pair. He could only get a good look at a few, but what he saw told him something about where he was, something that chilled him to the bone.
13.title: Among Giant pairs of Shoes

choices: Explore the Shoes
The ground begins to shake. Someone is coming
Find another place to hide.
131.content:
There was no question about it, based on the assorted sizes and designs Scott concluded the enormous footwear belonged to a family. He couldn't be 100% certain, but he guessed there were at least four members in the family. The High Heels no doubt belonged to the mother. A rather large pair of loafers, the Father. The Children he wasn't sure about, the footwear gave no indication of their genders other than there were definite differences in age.

Scott began to think, how he got there was a mystery and not important. What was important was what he'd do next? Clearly his car wouldn't be adequate protection. It could pass for a matchbox car but it didn't have the sturdiness of one. It could be crushed as easily as an egg wrapped in foil. He located the door of the closet and cautiously moved toward it. There was a gap just big enough for to drive the car under if he decided to do so. Looking out into the world beyond he saw walls, ceiling, furniture, all towering high above him. No sign of the Giant occupants. He listened carefully, not a sound. Not even a radio or TV. He was alone in the house.

There would be no better time to move to a different location. He looked about at the collection of shoes and sneakers, there was a lot he could learn about the giants of this home based on their footwear, he could explore them further.
131.title: The Family Of Giants

choices: Climb the cleats.
Climb the sneakers.
A distant rumbling announces that the family is home.
1311.content:
You wander amidst the titanic shoes, trying to make sense of them. Yes, it may make sense to go find a secure hiding place somewhere in the house, you're at least in a closet. You aren't in the middle of a hallway. And if you time it wrong, you could find yourself driving down a hallway as the family got home. Your car definitely wouldn't take someone stepping on it.

So instead you figure you'll try to glean as much information from the shoes as you can. It may not be perfect, but it's something to go on. Clearly, in this enormous world, you're going to be better off if you can find someone to help you. The closet might give you an idea of which family member to approach.

You wind your way past the high heels, heading away from the loafers. He knew there were two adults; he figured he'd try to get a read on the kids, figure out how big they were.

He came upon a massive pair of silver soccer cleats; they were almost as big as the mom's shoes, though not quite. He coughed a bit from the stench wafting from them; he wasn't sure whether they belonged to a boy or a girl, but they were certainly worn regularly. Based on the size of the shoes, this kid was probably somewhere around 13 -- not quite a grown-up, but getting close.

The second pair of shoes was a pair of sneakers, and while they were the size of a small warehouse, they were much smaller than the cleats. Maybe a seven or eight year old? He wasn't sure.

At this rate, it was going to take forever to surveil the closet, but Scott had an idea; maybe if he climbed up on one of the pairs of shoes, he could get a good look at the whole area. He'd just passed under the cleats, and one of their laces was laying on the ground; it would be an easy, if smelly climb. Or he could climb the smaller sneakers, but they had velcro closures; climbing them would be tough.
1311.title: Shoehenge

choices: The door opens.
The footsteps start again, heading somewhere else.
13111.content:
Scott decides that despite the smell, he's best off climbing up the cleats; he can always get down from them quickly, too. Carefully, he works his way along the shoelace, itself wider than a sidewalk. He swallows hard as he works his way up the side of the cleat; he has no idea how big he is, but it's clearly tiny. Even the kids will be thousands of feet tall compared to him.

Presently, he comes to the top of the shoe. He walks out onto the tongue, amazed that it doesn't even move with his weight.

Now he can get a better view. Okay, not much better, but still, he's able to see a few more pairs of shoes, and the first pair tells him something almost immediately. A pair of pink ballet flats sits beyond the smaller sneakers; though his small perspective makes it difficult, they certainly seem to be about the same size as the cleats. Okay, so a girl in her tweens or teens, cool, that's good to know -- though goodness, she needs to wash her feet once in a while.

Scott still can't get a read on the gender of the other child -- the smaller shoes he sees are all reasonably unisex. The girl, however, appears to be an athlete -- he can see a pair of basketball shoes that almost have to be hers. And beyond those, more pumps and heels for mom, and a couple pairs of sneakers for dad.

Scott sighs. Okay, at least he has a little bit of an idea of what this family looks like; he's not sure what he'll do with the information, but it's good to know. He starts to move off the tongue of the shoe when disaster strikes.

A booming slam announces that someone has entered the house. Scot freezes on instinct, but that doesn't do him any good. The footsteps of the person shake the ground, and vibrate the tongue of the shoe just a tiny bit. But to the ant-sized human on it, it's like a massive earthquake. Scott tries and fails to hang on, and before he knows it, he's in freefall.

He lands on a cushioned surface, and immediately coughs at the stench; he's fallen into the girl's cleat! More ominously, the sound of footsteps has stopped.
13111.title: Cleatastrophe

choices: It's the girl, grabbing her cleats.
It's the mom, putting a pair of shoes away.
131111.content: You shield your eyes as light suddenly invades the closet. You can't immediately figure out who the backlit person is who stands like a mountain before you. You squint into the light, hoping against hope it isn't the girl.
131111.title: Open and Shut Case

choices: Climb up onto her toes
Start a fire.
1311111.content:
Looking up through the opening of the Cleat, Scott stared up at the teenage girl who had opened the closet door. Based on her athletic build and what she wore, it was no doubt the teenage girl that stood towering above him was the owner of the Cleat he was now resideing. His worst fears were confirmed as she reached down and grabbed the cleat. As she picked it up the toe of the cleat pointed down ward causing him to slid along the imprint of the foot in the insole to the toe of the shoe. As quickly as it was lifted upward it was back on the floor again, and as it grew dark Scott knew it was coming. A foot, wearing a worn sock began to make it's way into the cleat. The shoe rocked back and forth as the foot forced it's way in, the toes wiggling as it inched forward. Whoever she was, she was uninterested in loosing the laces enough to allow her foot to slide in perfectly.

Scott's mind raced. What could he do? There was nowhere to run and in a few seconds the giant foot would be on top of him. He had two choices, climb up onto the socked toes or find some way to make her take the cleat off. He remembered the lighter in his pocket. Though he didn't smoke he always kept it handy. lighting the sock on fire was a dangerous thing to try, but considering the alternative....
1311111.title: Uh Oh

choices: He manages to grab on to the top of the sock.
He misses, and falls beneath her toes.
13111111.content:
As the toes began to get closer, he realized that there was no point in trying to start a fire; the humidity in the shoe is already climbing, and the smell of her socks tells you she's already begun to sweat; it would be like trying to set a damp rag on fire. No, his only choice was to try to get on top of the toes.

Scott didn't wait for them to reach him. Instead, he charged forward, figuring he'd have more space to maneuver this way. The light in the cleat was down to almost nothing, as the teen pushed her foot in. He ran full tilt across the springy sole, watching as her toes became building-sized. She had them curled back as she slid them further; screaming, he leaped for the top of the sock, just as she made the final push.
13111111.title: Climb up onto her toes

choices: Stay put.
Try to crawl into the sock.
131111112.content:
Scott cried out in horror as he failed to get a hold of the sock; the girl straightened her toes out, leaving him stuck in under them and the heavy sock.This was it. He was dead.

Or was he? Even as she began to settle her foot, Scott realized that he still had a chance. He was under her toes; maybe if he just stayed put, he could ride out the storm. It was risky, of course, but he might be able to live.

There was another option, though, one he suddenly realized as he lay underneath the socks. He was very small, and the socks were loose-woven athletic socks. He could worm his way inside, pulling himself inside the sock, and try to hide between her toes. But he knew he'd better do that fast if he hoped to survive.

He quickly decided to....
131111112.title: Toenado

choices: Haley gets to the field early enough to check.
She's behind; she goes straight into warm-ups.
1311111122.content:
Scott realized that staying put was probably a death sentence; the only other way to go was up. So he reached up and found a small hole in the weave, probably too small for him to notice, and pulled himself up and up and up, until he broke through the fabric.The shoes groaned and trembled as the girl shifted her weight, but fortunately, she hadn't started walking yet -- she was probably putting the other cleat on. That gave him enough time to break through into the chamber of her sock.

He flicked his lighter on, not to set anything on fire, but simply to try to get a view of his surroundings. He had come out between her fourth and fifth toes; he was shocked to see that even her pinky toe dwarfed him.

He quickly pulled himself in tight between the toes, pulling himself into the disgusting toe jam that collected here. It was like the smell of her cleats times a thousand.

And then the worst thing yet happened. The girl began to walk.

The world suddenly dropped out from under him, and then he was falling back down, and with a WHAM, her foot landed on the floor. A few moments passed, and the the world dropped, and he fell, and WHAM. Drop, fall, WHAM. Drop, fall, WHAM.

Then the world suddenly lifted up and there was a surprise WHAM, and then there was shuffling, and then finally, mercifully, the movement stopped.

Well, it didn't stop, exactly. The foot still shifted back and forth, tipping left and right as the girl moved her food unconsciously.

"...be...forgot....late...." he heard a muffled, feminine voice call from the distance.

"...ree...kay...game doesn't start for...its," came a louder voice from above him. Then, without warning, the toes of the girl scrunched tight, subjecting him to massive pressure from all sides. It wasn't enough to kill him, but it sure as hell scared him for a moment. This was going to be a long day.

* * *

Haley pulled her cleats on as quickly as she could; she knew she was in trouble. She'd forgotten to pack her cleats when she went to stay over at Emily's house the night before, and she hadn't realized it until her mom was picking her up. That meant they had to run back home and she had to slide them on quickly, before rushing back out and getting in the car.

"I can't believe you forgot your cleats Haley. We might be late."

"Sorry, mom. It's okay, the game doesn't start for twenty minutes. I'll be a bit late for warm-ups, that's all."

Haley sighed. Just a few years and she could drive. She just needed to keep telling herself that. Idly, as she thought this, she played with her toes; it almost felt like a little pebble had gotten into her sock. Oh well. Nothing she could do about it until they got to the field. If they got there early enough, she would take her sock off and check. And if not...well, it wasn't that big a deal.
1311111122.title: Inside Man

choices: ...and knocked Scott loose onto the ground.
...and scraped him skyward on her fingernail.
13111111221.content:
It was a miserable ten minutes; to Scott, it felt like a hundred. Tons and tons of teenage girl toes pressed on him unconsciously as far above, she texted on her phone. She made it to the field just before warm-ups were to start, and she was relieved to see that the previous game had gone long. She wouldn't be late after all!

Haley sprinted across the grass, unknowingly torturing a tiny man between her two toes. Scott was starting to get sick from the sudden motion, the slamming of her foot, the sweat that was beginning to pour off of it. He was relieved when things slowed back down to a walk, and then finally, they stopped.

Haley gathered on the sideline by her teammates; she chatted with them aimlessly as they waited to get on the field. Taking the opportunity, she reached down and untied her shoe, and pulled it off, following her socks.

Scott was greeted by light so bright it dazzled him; he looked up, and saw the girl's face just cresting her knee, staring down at him. She must have felt him! He was saved! She reached an index finger the size of a skyscraper toward his prison between her toes. It slowly approached him, her sparkly blue nail polish reflecting the sun right into his eyes. She slid the finger between her toes....
13111111221.title: Checking Her Feet

choices: ...until he was staring at a giant eye. (Aware)
...until he slammed into the sock again. (Unaware)
131111112212.content: Scott's joy was short-lived, as the finger suddenly dropped below him, and with a groaning and scratching, pulled up. He was knocked, along with thousands and thousands of dead skin cells, into the short tip of her fingernail. He continued to lift for a moment....
131111112212.title: ...and scraped him skyward on her fingernail.

choices: Remain in the cleat
Climb out of the cleat
1311112.content:
You can't really make out much other than the fact it's a giantess standing over the cleats. You etch as the huge giantess leans over places what you think is a pair of high heels down in the closet. This must be the mom.

"Oh my, I can't believe she put her cleats in here. She didn't even air them out." The giantess mutters although it still sounds rather loud to you.

The giantess reaches for the cleats and picks them up, sending you tumbling all over the stinky smelly cleat.

You suddenly feel weightless as you free fall though the air as the giantess drops the huge cleats onto the ground. You have no idea where the cleats are now but you tumble towards the shoe opening after the shoes are dropped.

You look up and see the giantess is rather pretty. She has sharp features, blonde hair, you think blue eyes and tan skin. She is wearing a white button up blouse and a black pencil skirt along with dark nylons. She must've have just come home from work. She is apparently doing something on the counter as she stands there.
1311112.title: It's the mom, putting a pair of shoes away.

choices: He's able to climb up and out.
He can't make it.
131112.content:
Scott breathes a sigh of relief -- well, as best he can inside the cleat -- as the rumble pauses, then continues on. Whoever it is must have just been getting home. Okay. Well, that was scary, but it's over now; time to get out of the cleat!

Scott walks over to the side, amazed that a teenage girl's shoes could smell this bad. At long last, he reaches the sheer cliff of the inside of the shoe; he realizes this is going to be a tougher climb than he expected.
131112.title: Spared -- For Now

choices: Travel at Night
Leave the Closet now and risk being spotted.
1311121.content:
If this had been a New cleat, Scott concluded he wouldn't have a chance to escape. But this wasn't a new cleat. Plenty of loose threads to use to climb up. He grabbed one that looked it could take him to the top. It had been while since he'd done this sort of climbing, not since he graduated high school. He hoped he still had the upper body strength.

He began climbing. So far so good. As he climbed he began to contemplate what to do next, the first order of business he concluded was survival. Step one of that was to get out of this cleat. But once he got out then what? He swung his leg up over the side and sat to catch his breath. Not bad, he felt a little winded but he did better than he thought. He was glad to be off that that fowl smelling insole. Didn't anyone hear of oder eaters? Wait, no, the chemicals in the oder eaters would probably would've killed him. Does that mean he should be thankful for the stench? He was putting too much though into it.

Carefully, Scott slid down the outside of the cleat to the floor. He was halfway back to his car when he felt a tremor. And another, stronger then the last, followed by another even stronger. Footsteps! Well he couldn't be certain they were footsteps but he'd seen enough giant monster movies to come to that conclusion. By the time he reached his car the floor was shaking so much he could barely stand. Then the footsteps stopped. Through the crack under the door Scott Looked and saw a pair of socked, but nicely shaped feet. He heard the doorknob turn and the door swung open, a powerful wind from the displacement of air threatened to take him off his feet. There was a blinding light, he covered his eyes for a moment until he could adjust to the light. His eyes adjusted, blinking he looked up at the mountain of a teenage girl. Based on her athletic build and what she wore, it was no doubt the teenage girl that stood towering above him was the owner of the Cleat he'd just escaped from. She reached down and grabbed the cleats, Scott was thankful he'd escaped in time. He was in darkness once again as the door of the closet was closed once more. He heard her drop the cleats on the floor and slip them on her feet. As she walked away and the footsteps faded he heard two muffled voices. Feminine.

"...be...forgot....late...."

"...ree...kay...game doesn't start for...its,"

Well, that was close, and exhilarating. He needed to move on, staying in a closet wasn't fun at all and there was nothing in there he could survive on. He didn't know about the dangers that lay beyond that door. He checked his watch, if the time was correct it was just after twelve in the afternoon. He could risk leaving the safety of the closet now or wait until nightfall and travel in the cover of darkness.
1311121.title: He's able to climb up and out.

choices: A woman in her late 30s -- probably the mother.
A girl of maybe 8 or 9.
1311122.content:
Scott tries as best he can, but he's only able to get about halfway up before he loses his grip and tumbles back down into the smelly -- but cushioned -- sole of the shoe. Again, he gives it a go; this time he only gets a third of the way up. He's panting as he pulls himself up off the ground, and exhausted; how can it be possible that he's so small he can't even get out of someone's shoe?

Suddenly, the rumbling comes back; Scott shudders in terror. What if it's the teen girl coming back to get the cleat? Oh, God, he could be crushed!

His world is bathed in light, as the closet doors creak open. He stares in mute horror at the enormous, backlit figure of....
1311122.title: Tough Going

choices: There!  You can read it!
You lean too far and fall in.
13112.content:
Yeah, there was no way you'd be climbing the cleats. The stench was potent, overwhelming, and all together unpleasant. The sneakers, however, hardly had a smell to them. That alone was worth the extra effort involved. No point climbing the shoe if the odor keeps you from thinking straight.

Odd, you thought to yourself. Converse brand shoes. Even giant sized alternate realities have such recognizable brands. Above the scuffed sole, the black fabric was emblazoned with the familiar All-Star logo. You couldn't help but wonder if you really were in a different world, or if you simply shrunk. It wasn't the time for such thoughts, but it'd be something to ponder later.

The actual climb of the shoe was a lot less difficult than expected. It was an older sneaker, frayed and beat. Tiny threads and notches served as a perfect climbing surface, and in a surprisingly short time you were on top of the shoe. It was impressive (and a little disheartening) to see that the shoe didn't bend even a little under your weight.

As you looked around, you realized the whole idea to climb was bust. The surrounding shoes that you'd already identified towered over the little sneaker; you could see past them in the slightest. After all that work, you knew nothing more.

Sighing, you sat down on the shoe's tongue. Maybe there was some info on the shoe's label? You peer into the shoe. Anything on the insole was worn away, leaving only faded smudges. However, the tag on the back of the tongue did have letter's on it. From here, you couldn't read them. If you just leaned forward a bit further...
13112.title: Interdemensional marketing

choices: A mother is tidying up the shoe closet.
An 8 year old Boy is putting his sneakers on
A 9 year old  Girl is putting her sneakers on
A "petite" 18 year old girl is putting her sneakers on.
131122.content:
He'd leaned to far. That was Scott's first reaction as he felt himself sliding forward. He tried to pull himself up but it was too late. His second reaction was to scream as he free fell into the interior of the sneaker. The impact was jarring enough that it knocked the wind out of him and he saw stars flash over his vision. He lay there on his back for some time before he was able to breath properly again.

Scott checked himself over. Nothing felt broken, but damn did it ever hurt. Painfully he rolled over on his stomach and rose to a crouched position. He looked about. The interior of the sneaker was cavernous. You wouldn't think that an 8 year old kid's sneaker could be called that, but that was the best way to describe it. That made him fearful to think of the size of the kid who wore it. Getting to his knees, he looked about. There was no way out. No loose threads, no hand or foot holds. He was trapped. All because he was curious about a damn tag.

Just when he though "How much worst can it get?" he felt a tremor.

Then another.

And another

And another

Each one growing stronger than the last. He'd seen enough dinosaur movies to know what that was, and that was no T-Rex approaching. He could hear the loud thud of the approaching giant. It suddenly got bright as the closet door was opened. Then a shadow filled the opening of the sneaker. Despite the pain in his body Scott got to his feet. Filled with dread he suspected what might be next.
131122.title: Trapped in a Sneaker

choices: Joey notices something silver (Scott's car)
The Door closes leaving Scott in darkness
Some time later Scott ventures out in search of help
Mom decides to tidy up the closet
Sarah is asked to tidy up the closet
13113.content:
You could say that the Thompsons were a nuclear family. Mom and Dad. Brother and Sister. Dad, Phil Thompson, was five ten and his job paid enough for he and his family to live comfortably. A rare thing in an age where both parents had to work to make ends meet. Mom, Mary Thompson, was shorter than her husband. Standing only five foot one it was a pain in the ass at times to grab something off the top shelf when she went grocery shopping, but she managed. Seventeen year old Sarah Thompson, the oldest child, was taller than her mother by three inches and was a bit leaner than her mother due to her athletic activities in school. At age twelve Joey was the shortest in the family being only four foot even. That of course was expected for his age. Like his father he wore glasses. Something he found annoying at times. He often wished he could wear regular sunglasses but due to his poor eyesight that was impossible. One day he hoped to get corrective eye surgery.

The family car pulled into the driveway after an excursion to the mall. As they walked up to the house the had no inkling of who and what was in their house, he of course was aware of them the moment the car came to a stop and they climbed out.

As they stepped into the house and approached the closet the floor shook, unnoticed by them, the malibu rocked on it's shocks. With no time to waste, Scott ran back to his car and hoped for the best just as the door swung open. Shoes of all sizes rained down around him like falling cruise ships.Mom, Dad, and Sis each took turns placing their shoes, flipflops, and sneakers into the closet. When Joey's turn came he just dropped them and didn't care where they landed.
13113.title: The Family

choices: A teenage boy
A mature woman(45 or so)
A teenage Girl
1312.content:
He didn't notice the sound at first. His attention was naturally on his surroundings. But then he felt the first tremor and a moment after that he heard the slap of bare feet on floor. With his options limited, Scott bolted back toward the car. He knew it wouldn't do as far as protection went but it was better than being out in the open. He'd just made it back to the car when the footsteps stopped in front of the closet door. With his heart pounding he jumped into driver's side and laid down on the passenger side seat as the door opened. A powerful gust of wind blew dust around the car as the air was displaced. If he'd been out in that when the door opened he might well have been blown out into the hallway.

Who had opened the closet door?
1312.title: The ground begins to shake. Someone is coming

13123.content: The door is opened, and light flooded over you. Once your eyes adjusted, you saw that it was a teenage girl of about...
13123.title: A teenage Girl

choices: Ran towards her, it was worth a shot after all.
Found somewhere new to hide, she'd probably smash him like the bug he was.
131231.content:
As light flooded into the cupboard, Scott slowly lifted himself from the passenger seat. He stared into the titanic form that'd made itself apparent in the opening, this girl was humongous.

----------------------------------------------------------------

Lilly pushed some brunette hair from her face as she pulled the shoe closet open, kneeling down as she looked for her shoes. Although the closet was an undeniably convenient place to store footwear, the rest of her family had a tendency to just shove their shoes in, meaning her's were forced to the back. She began to hum to herself, slowly taking her mother's heels out and setting them down just on the floor.

----------------------------------------------------------------

As the enormous heels lifted over him, the bug sized Scott found himself in the open. As he watched the girl move the shoes, an idea entered his mind. At this size, he'd undoubtedly need help to survive, and this girl could help him. Slowly clambering out of the car, he...

choices: Go to the kitchen.
Head down the hallway.
Your timing is terrible -- a series of thuds announces the family's return.
1313.content:
You start the car, and pull out into the entryway. Your car bounces along the vinyl flooring, but you push it onward. You have no desire to be caught in the middle of the floor when the family gets back.

You can see an enormous kitchen not far away, relatively speaking. That would be a great place to hide, and scavenge for food. Then again, a long wooden hallway beckoned you onward into the living area.
1313.title: Going for a ride

choices: A group of Teen Boys (game time)
A group of Teen girls (Movie Time)
13132.content:
As Scott drove along the hallway he wondered how long his luck was going to hold out. Not just the fact he hadn't seen anyone yet, but also that he hadn't busted a shock or spring driving over the bumpy vinyl flooring. The Malibu wasn't meant for off roading. it took him about ten minutes to drive down the hallway to where he figured was the living room. When he arrived there he came to a complete stop. It was a living room all right. Couch, flat screen TV, DVD case. Instead of vinyl floor however there was thick carpet. The fibers were a good seven feet tall. He wasn't going to drive through that.

Parking the car close to the fall where he hoped it wouldn't be noticed, Scott ventured toward the sofa. The Idea was that he could hide underneath and observe the occupants of the house safely. Try to find out more about them and decide whether to try to get someone's attention or simply stay out of their way. The couch looked like an imposing structure, even from the distance he was at the moment. He wondered how he'd react to seeing the giants who sat on it.

Suddenly he heard something from above. A door closing, this house had an upstairs? He heard thundering footsteps and before long he could hear someone walking down a set of stairs, toward the living room! Scott's heard raced, he still had a long way to go to the safety of the couch and he knew he'd never make it in time.

He turned to face the First Giant or Giantess he would ever see.

Who is it?
13132.title: The living room

choices: She picks the shoes you are under, dragging you along for the ride.
She picks the shoes you are under and sees you under them.
She picks another pair of shoes but leaves the door wide open
132.content:
All Scott could around him were shoes of all kinds and boots of all lengths but all at an impossible size. The high heel next to the speck, a mere three inches to it's wearer, towers over a hundred feet tall to you.

BOOM.

BOOM.

BOOM,

And judging by the ever increasing earthquakes, the owner of the shoe closet is coming. Light creaks open, nearly blinding Scott as before him a three thousand foot tall feminine silhouette surveys her vast shoe collection.

"Hmm..."

A quiet murmur from her is a terrifyingly loud rumble from the heavens for Scott. The titaness crouched down allowing Scott to survey her immense beauty. Long, pale legs led into a cute baby blue dress that covered a slender frame and even more supple breasts. Beyond that, he could see a cute face complemented by deep green eyes before coming to her hair, flame red and a thousand feet high.

"AH!" The giantess thundered. She had made her choice of footwear for the day.
132.title: In the giantess' closet

choices: ... right into the other upright shoe
... onto the floor between the giantess' feet
... up onto her lap
1321.content:
A new deafening noise began to assault Scott's eardrums as a terrifying sight. The two pillars were dragging along the floor right in his direction! Before the teen could even react, he was caught on one, now having to cling for his dear life as the titanic ginger that unknowingly held him captive slapped her tan nylon-clad feet across the floor.

The skyscraper redhead soon settled down onto her bed. Scott's nausea ramped up tenfold as the young goddess droped her shoes to the floor with an earth-shattering impact that flung the tiny man...
1321.title: She picks the shoes you are under, dragging you...

choices: You make it far enough to end up under her toes
You get caught under the ball of her foot
13211.content:
Soft, stinky tan leather cushioned Scott's fall as he landed head-first into the giantess' shoe. The smell here was overwhelming. Faint whiffs of strawberry and other pleasant fruity smells were overtaken by the powerful stench of old footsweat. It was likely unnoticeable to the impossible beauty that owned these shoes but he was a minute little bug in this realm. Everything was amplified to his tiny nostrils.

He looked up to observe the giantess' next move. Her dazzling green eyes were transfixed on the field-sized cell phone in her hand. A furious mashing of fingers later and her eyes shifted back to the shoes that you were trapped in. She bent over, her face getting closer but still unaware of your presence as she dragged the herculean constructs towards her feet. Your vision of the goddess was quickly obscured by her perfect, smooth tan nylon-clad sole. She was putting her shoes on and you needed to move!
13211.title: ... right into the other upright shoe

choices: Middle age woman
A lean teenage Boy
A blond Teenage girl
A young man in his twenties
134.content:
They were footwear. Enormous footwear. Reaching back into the car he removed his emergency flash light out of the glove compartment.

As he shown the light around Scott noticed that they were also not in the best of shape. Though they varied from Shoes to flip flops every single one of them showed signs of wear and tear. Some worst than others. Then there was the smell. The distinctive odor of human foot sweat was everywhere.

If this was a dream, it was the most vivid one he'd ever had.

Why so many in such a place? Never mind the fact they were giant footwear intended for giants that science had said could not exist. Why were they all here? Scott began to think, and came to the conclusion that these were for recreational use. After all if you just happened to live by a river you wouldn't wear your good sneakers to take a walk along it.

Scott's flashlight beam fell upon one particular pair of sneakers. They were badly worn. Almost to the point that they should've been thrown out. What got his attention was the hole in the toe of one. It was big enough for him to shine the light into the interior. Big enough for him to crawl into if he so desired.

Out of curiosity he decided to do just that.

The interior walls were not much better shape than the exterior. Loose threads hung everywhere and the once grey material had been stained a shade of brown in places. What interested him the most though was the insole. There were huge craters formed in it's surface. Craters made by an enormous foot. Scott walked to the spot where the ball of the foot would've rested and touched the darkened stained surface. As he did so, Scott felt a tremor through the floor. Then another, stronger than the last, then another, and Another. Someone or something was coming and the timing was impeccable.

'Get out of there!' his brain was telling him 'RUN!!!!'

But Scott didn't run. He had to see what it was. Or who. He turned off his flash light and walked out to the opened area of the heel. There was a blast of air and brilliant light as the great closet door was opened. As his eyes adjusted he looked upward.

A chill went down his spine as he realized the giant that stood there had its eyes focused on the sneaker he was in. The Giant was a
134.title: The graveyard of footwear.

choices: The kids are leaving the house on the way to school.
A mom is pushing a stroller down the sidewalk.
Two young women are out for a jog.
A car is pulling up to the curb.
It was nothing -- just his imagination.
14.content:
He was still on concrete, just as he was when driving down the road. But this concrete was rough and pitted, with a several-foot-wide gap not far in front of the car. Scott looked past the concrete, and saw a strange, almost alien forest, full of some kind of grass that stood dozens of feet high. He craned his neck further, and suddenly, his heart jumped into his throat.

Far beyond the forest, there was a building, a building bigger than anyone had ever conceived of. He couldn't even conceive of how big it must be. Miles and miles, certainly. That was not what frightened him, though. What frightened him was that it this giant building appeared to be a perfectly normal suburban house. Even further beyond it, there was another house, almost identical to it.

The forest was just grass. And he couldn't be bigger than an ant.

Suddenly, he felt a low rumbling. He wasn't sure where it was coming from, he only knew that it couldn't be good.
14.title: In front of an Enormous House

choices: They Don't notice the car (Crunch)
They Don't notice the car but miss stepping on it
One of them Notices the car and picks it up
They don't notice the car (Car gets damaged)
141.content:
Billy, Shelly, and Austin Anderson stepped out of their home. Each Child had a backpack over their shoulder and all went to the same school. Billy, the oldest was in the senor grade while his younger sister and Brother were in the lower grades; Austin being the youngest. They casually walked up the concrete walkway the way they always did, chatting amongst themselves about various subjects. None of them would consider what they were doing potentially deadly but then none of them were viewing the world from ground level. As was the case for the lone occupant in a silver Malibu only a few steps away.

Scott was mesmerized by what he was seeing, the kids were only young and yet a single footfall was enough to bounce the car on it's shocks. He could only guess at their ages but they'd have to have been between 15 and 8. He had been so distracted by what he was seeing that he hadn't realized the danger he was in until it was too late. A single footstep would be all that was needed to flatten the car into tinfoil.

Before he could even make an effort to put the car in gear and drive it out of the path of destruction the kids were upon him. He was a step away from death under a sneaker wearing foot.
141.title: The Anderson Childern

1411.content: 2003 Chevy Malibu vs a size 73 sneakered foot equaled a flawless victory for Shelly who barely even noticed what she'd stepped on as she headed for the waiting bus with her brothers.The End was merciful for Scott as the equivalent weight of 46,500 Tons came down on top of the car. For the preteen, it had been like stepping on a wrapper or some other crinkly garbage. She didn't stop to see what it was, and it was a full two days before the remains of the Malibu were even notice. If one could visualize the inside of Austin's room it can be seen as a part of his Godzilla display, among the crushed cars at the plastic monster's feet. He'll point it out to anyone to asks which one it is as it's the most detailed in the display.
1411.title: They Don't notice the car (Crunch)

choices: The Family Dog
The Family Cat
The Mother of the children (she's doing some gardening)
1412.content:
A huge shape blocked the morning sun as the equivalent of a size 89 shoe came crashing down. When the sneakered foot that belonged to the oldest boy came down, the very tip of the toe of the sneaker landed on the engine compartment of the car completely flattening it like aluminum foil under 90,776 tons of weight. As the foot lifted off it kicked the ruined Malibu towards the front door the house, the car stayed on it's remaining two rear tires but spun out of control until stopping just under the first step. It was about that time the airbag went off.

One he realized he was still alive, Scott looked out the back window (what was left of it) and saw the three potential executioners board the school bus. The kid didn't even notice. He considered himself lucky, if he'd been standing there with no car he'd be a stain by now. Even though he hurt all over, he crawled out of the wreckage of his car (had just made the last payment too) and wondered if he ever got back how he was going to explain to his insurance company how his car got partially crushed by a teenage boy.

Scott quickly realized that his only opinion was to find shelter in the house, Looking up at the step and the enormous door of that house made him also realize it wouldn't be easy. He couldn't climb the step, and he couldn't push open the door, nor could he crawl under the door as he could see the weather stripping firmly in place. He did notice the animal door though, so the family ether owned a dog or cat. Neither one was a creature he wanted to meet up with. The dog he figured wouldn't be too bad, but a cat...

There was a sudden commotion from the other side of the door. Someone or something was coming.
1412.title: What odds?

choices: A White Terrier
A Beagle

Well, only two choices, so which will it be.

14121.title: What kind of a dog?

choices: Follow the Woman
Explore the House
141211.content:
What happened next was so fast that it took Scott a few moments to process what the huge hairy creature that jumped over him was. The dog was a ball of energy as it bounded about looking for just the right spot to do it's business. Typical behavior for a dog. It was a cute one too, a white Terrier that was probably no more than 11 inches tall, but to Scott it looked as big as an Imperial Walker from The Empire Strikes back. Watching the animal gave Scott an idea. It could work too if he timed it just right.

After about 10 minutes or so the Terrier was bounding back to the front door. It stopped just long enough to bark, announcing that it was ready to come back inside. Scott wasted no time to clamber onto one of the dog's front paws despite the aches and pains of being in an accident. He didn't know how well he was going to hang on but there was no time to back out. The door swung open and the Terrier Hopped up inside the house. The forward motion resulted in two things

1) It made it possible for Scott to get inside the house

2) It also caused him to loose is less than firm grip on the fur of the dog's paw.

This forward flight through space was fortunately short and only resorted to a small skid across the floor. When he stopped and gained his bearings he looked upward to see an impossibly tall woman stepping towards him. Her socked foot slammed down beside him and pushed off as she continued on her way, completely oblivious of the little visitor she left into her house. Though he only had a glimpse of her face and only saw her from behind, Scott guest she was in her Forties. Her hair was light brown and shoulder length. She wore loose jeans and a sweat shirt. He watched her and the dog walk off until they were out of his line of vision, then wondered what to do next.
141211.title: A White Terrier

Short Hair

1413.title: Who will it be?

choices: "Awh, an itty bitty little bug,"
"Eww, a bug's in your toy Austin!"
14132.content:
Shelly followed her brothers, the little blonde girl adjusting her round glasses. The girl was eleven, having just entered into 6th grade. She chattered away to her younger brother as they headed along to the schoolbus. She twirled a lock of her curly blonde hair around with a finger, about to continue her little conversation with Austin as she heard a tiny noise, just faintly.

She bit her lip, looking around for the source of the noise.


For Scott, however, he saw something much different. He saw the other two titanic kids just avoid his Malibu, their booming footsteps rattling the car. He full on screamed as an enormous dark blue sneaker landed next to his car, sending it sliding away.


The 'small' girl looked down, bright green eyes landing on the little shape by her foot. Curiosity piqued, she reached down, a dainty finger and thumb pinching up the miniature vehicle. She brought it to her face, a smile curling across her lips. As far as Shelly could tell, this was a toy car. But there was just something about it. The eleven year-old brought it even closer to her eyes. Then, she saw it, a tiny something inside the car.


Scott screamed as he was brought into the air, his ears popping. He heard the metal groaning as the fingers pressed into it. Once sufficiently high up, he could make out the face of his titanic captor. The girl had a round head, with freckled cheeks. Her grinning mouth revealed dimples and pearly white teeth. Green eyes gazed onto his car through the enormous, round glasses and curly blonde hair rolled down the back of her head like a waterfall. He bit his lip in anticipation as she whispered:
14132.title: Shelly

choices: Shirt Pocket
Pants Pocket
141321.content:
Shelly's eyes softened as she tried to look in at the bug to have a look at it, though she couldn't see whatever it was clearly.
"Aww," She cooed, trying to force the car door open with her fingers, "You can't drive that, li'l fella, it's only a toy," She chastised, biting her lip as she failed to open the door. She was obviously unaware that this was a real car, and that the little 'bug' she'd found was a man, much older than she was.

Shelly jumped as a large voice interrupted her conversation with the insect.
"Hey lass, ye gettin' on or what?" It was the driver.

"Oh, erm, sorry," She chirped, enclosing the car in a gentle fist as she skipped onto the school bus. The girl sat down next to her brother, smiling softly before she brought the car up to her face again.

"I've gotta go to school little bug, you can stay in your little car, but you need to go in my ___,"
141321.title: "Awh, an itty bitty little bug,"

choices: She trips up.
She gets to her classroom without issue.
1413211.content:
Shelly pushed her pocket open with a finger, gently lowering the tiny toy car into it before grinning down at it.
"Alright, see you after school little bug," She cooed, slowly pushing her pocket shut.

The last thing Scott saw before his world was plunged into darkness was the smiling face of a near omnipotent young girl. He leaned back in the car, feeling the titanic girl's body heat already. This was going to be a long day.

Shelly sat back in the chair, swinging her legs back and forth as she began to hum to herself. She absently twirled some of her hair around a finger, mind drifting off as she waited to get to school.

Her soft pocket continued to heat up as the little bug and it's car drifted to the back of the young girl's mind. Soon enough, the bus reached their school, the kids all rushing off the bus. Shelly ran after some of her friends.
1413211.title: Shelly's Sizable Shirt Pocket

choices: Start Climbing
Wait in the car
Leave the car
14133.content:
As Austin walked with his brother and sister something silver caught his attention. He paused and looked down as his siblings continued on without notice. He picked it up. It was a toy car, where did that come from? It didn't look like one of his.

"Come on, Austin! The bus is almost here!"

"Coming!"

Without a second thought he slipped the car into the pocket of his coat and ran to catch up with his brother and sister. For Scott, getting picked up by a giant kid car and all and dropped into a dark pocket was a pretty scary experience. That's putting it lightly, he was lucky he didn't shit his pants. Looking out the back window through the opening of the pocket, the outside world rushed by. Everything came to a stop, he heard a loud rumble, then more movement. Finally the kid had stopped moving, yet the sensation of moving and the loud rumble remained. He couldn't tell but, based on the background noise of kids chatting about various subjects, he assumed the kid was on a bus.

Now what was he going to do?

He felt safe in his car, but he knew that was a false feeling because he knew the kid could crush his Malibu like foil. If the sound of buckling metal when the car was picked up was any indication. He wasn't much safer outside the car either, with him being trapped in a giant's pocket and all. It would be safer if he could somehow get this kid's attention. He's sitting down, so climbing up to his ear would be "Easier" than when he's walking. That could backfire if it turned out this Kid was a real A-hole. The longer he thought of it, the more he concluded that no matter what he did things didn't look good.
14133.title: Pocket

choices: Scott makes his way to the Teacher's Desk
Scott reluctantly gets back into his car.
Scott decided to climb up to Austin's Ear instead
Austin stands up and walks over to the Teacher's desk.
141332.content:
After thinking about it for a few moments Scott decided that there was no way in hell he was going to leave his car while the kid was on the bus. He didn't know how long the bus drive to the school would be and he didn't want to be halfway up to the kid's shoulder when he decided to stand up and move. It was better to remain where he was until he had more time.

As it turned out, it was the best course of action. The drive to the school was fifteen minutes at the most, and as soon as the bus stopped the kid was on the move. Scott could hear the chatter of students as the kid made his way to the school while his unexpected passenger was rocked back and forth with every swing of a leg. For Austin, the walk to his home room was uneventful. He sat down in his desk and took out his math book. He put his hand into the pocket of his jacket and for a moment it looked to Scott that he was going to take the car out of his pocket to look at it some more. Instead, he ran his fingers over the contours of the vehicle leaving smeared fingerprint oil over the glass in the process. Then the door opened and the teacher walked in. Austin quickly withdrew his hand.

After waiting a moment, Scott felt sure it was safe and decided to venture out into the pocket. He had almost climbed up to the edge of the pocket as the teacher walked by. For Scott he caught a brief look at a pair of athletic shins in nylon. This was enough to make him rush to the edge of the pocket and peer out into the class room. The teacher was making her way back up to the desk, this time Scott got a better look at her. She was ebony in completion, kinda reminded him of Phylicia Rashād when she played Clair Huxtable on The Cosby Show. She wore a blue skirt and matching blouse. Her hair was shoulder length and most of all wore no wedding ring. She thundered past, her stilettos making an echoy clicking as he walked. It took a moment for Scott to realize his jaw was hanging open.

As she began her class, Scott formulated a plan. If he wanted to get help from someone a rational adult would be a better choice than a kid . He'd use the car, but really everything he needed he could take with him in his backpack. He'd just have to climb down to the floor and make his way under the teacher's desk. There was another reason of course. A desire that made him feel guilty. He didn't consider himself a pervert, but faced with such a woman it was hard to resist. He only had an hour, whatever he was going to do he had better make up his mind to do it. It was now or never.
141332.title: Hots for the teacher

choices: Scott makes it under the Teacher's desk
The Teacher gets up and walks around to the front of her desk
Scott get's noticed by a student,
Austin stands up and walks over to the Teacher's desk.
1413321.content:
Scott wasted no time gathering what he thought he’d need. First Aid kit, Water, and a few protein bars he had picked up at the gas station. He rummaged through his trunk and found a box cutter, and an unexpected find. Ice picks ,and slip on Ice cleats.

‘So THAT’S where they went’ Scott. He’d been looking for those since last year. They be very useful when the time came to climb. He slipped the cleats on and closed the trunk. It sucked that he’d have to leave the car behind, but if he wanted to be with the teacher he had no choice.

‘Well, it’s a piece of junk anyway.’

With his backpack secured he climbed up over the edge of the pocket and looked out. He was hundreds of feet in the air and a fall from this height would be fatal. Scott carefully inched his way down the jacket to the jean pants leg. Already he was thankful for those cleats. Scott ran the length of the Kid’s thigh and breathed a sigh of relief that he had not been noticed. Now came the hard part. Scott inched his way off the kid’s knee and made his decent down the pants leg.

Once again he was thankful to have those cleats. He doubted he’d be able to make the decent without them. It took longer than he would’ve liked to climb down to the sneakered foot, but it wasn’t like he was a pro mountain climber. Thankfully the cuff of the jeans covered most of the sneaker or he’d have to climb up out of the sneaker as well. As it was though all he had to do was traverse the shoe laces and climb down to the floor.

Scott took a moment to catch his breath. One step closer to... what was her name anyway? The students never called her anything other than "Ms". Well, until he could learn her name, Scott decided to call her "Clair" and planned what to do next.

There were two students sitting in front of the kid he just climbed down from, in order to reach the Teacher’s desk he’d have to make his way past them without being noticed. He didn’t think it would be too hard, he just had to be on the lookout. The hardest part would be the distance between the teacher’s desk and the Student. He’d be out in the open. He could get spotted.

Scott removed the cleats and bolted under the desk in front of him. So far, so good. He crept around the feet of the Student and ran to the next desk.
1413321.title: Traversing the classroom

choices: Scott makes it to the House
