Make his way in the oposite direction
153111221.content:
Sure, he could've stayed all night admireing those soles but he decided not to in favor of something a little more mature. So he gave the foot one last glance and made his way off the bed.

Climbing down from a bed that size was a lot more nerve racking than he thought it would be. If it hadn't been from the blankets touching the floor the task would've been impossible for Scott. It almost was. More than once he had been close to falling to his death, it was only though pure luck that he'd made it to the floor. Upon reaching the floor he rested for about fifteen minutes before continueing his journey.

Before he moved out, Scott shut off his flashlight. The Lightning flashes would light his way, and besides that he didn't want the giant pre-teen in the bed to glance toward the floor and see his light. No telling what she would've done.

Walking through carpet fibers almost up to your chin required more time than he would've liked, but was unavoidable. As he made his way to the bedroom door he glanced over his shoulder to make sure the young giantess was still in bed. The last thing he wanted was for her to get out of bed and head in his direction.

He waited until he was under the bedroom door and into the Hallway before he felt safe enough to turn the flashlight back on. The hallway was dark and vast. A little creepy too. That didn't help his situation at all. As he looked about he wondered which way to go up the hallway or down? After debating it for a moment or two he decided to
153111221.title: Get out of there

choices: Bathroom
laundry Room
1531112211.content:
Between the thunderclaps and the flashes of lightning the whole scene reminded Scott of something out of a horror movie from the forties. He half expected to bump into Lon Chaney Jr. The floor of the Hallway was hardwood with rugs lining the center. Nice to have for those winter days and you wanted to walk bare foot without getting cold feet. Pictures hung on the walls, though in the gloom it was difficult to tell what the subject matter was or who might be in them.

Scott must've walked along that hallway for a sold half hour. In that time the storm didn't let up not one bit. If not for the walls of the house he was certain he would've gone deaf from the noise. Finally he came upon a closed door hundreds of feet tall. There was really know way for Scott to know what was behind that door, it could just as easily be a closet than a bedroom. Either way he was tired and needed a place to spend the night. He could figure out what to do in the morning. Hell maybe this was just a dream. Nah, too real to be a dream. There was, to his perspective, a four foot gap under the door. Turning his flashlight back on, he crawled under the door to find--
1531112211.title: Down the hallway

choices: The Bed
The Closet
1531112212.content:
Between the thunderclaps and the flashes of lightning the whole scene reminded Scott of something out of a horror movie from the forties. He half expected to bump into Lon Chaney Jr. The floor of the Hallway was hardwood with rugs lining the center. Nice to have for those winter days and you wanted to walk bare foot without getting cold feet. Pictures hung on the walls, though in the gloom it was difficult to tell what the subject matter was or who might be in them.

Scott must've walked along that hallway for a sold half hour. In that time the storm didn't let up not one bit. If not for the walls of the house he was certain he would've gone deaf from the noise. Finally he came upon a closed door hundreds of feet tall. There was really know way for Scott to know what was behind that door, it could just as easily be a closet than a bedroom. Either way he was tired and needed a place to spend the night. He could figure out what to do in the morning. Hell maybe this was just a dream. Nah, too real to be a dream. There was, to his perspective, a four foot gap under the door. Turning his flashlight back on, he crawled under the door to find--

It was indeed a bedroom, a bedroom meant for an adult. Scott had found the Master Bedroom, but was there anyone asleep in that great big bed. The the lightning illuminated the interior and as far as he could tell the bed was empty. Being that it was a king sized bed he would have to go around to the other side to be sure but as of that moment he concluded the room was empty. So where was the adult? A check of his watch told him nothing of the hour as it's digital readouts were going crazy, but it had to be late. From the impression he got, the young girl he encountered looked a little young to be spending the night alone. Maybe the adult or adults were in another part of the house, or out late and got caught in the storm?

Who knows. Well, since he was alone at the moment, Scott felt fairly confident that it was safe to leave the flashlight on and made his way across the carpeted floor towards --
1531112212.title: Night time ventureing

choices: She is coming
15311122122.content:
You can learn a lot about someone by checking out their closets. What they liked to wear, and whether or not they are married or single. In this case, Scott was hoping for single. As he made his way to the large door on the far wall next to the bed he looked for other signs such as his and her slippers or photographs. He saw one pair of fuzzy slippers but that didn't mean anything as the husband or boyfriend might not wear slippers. As for photos, the room was too poorly lit to see stuff like that despite the flashes of lightning which were diminishing in intensity and timing.

Upon climbing under the door he shown his flashlight beam around illuminating the dark interior. As he had hoped, he'd seen several pairs of shoes but not a single pair of shoes owned by a man. Even the clothing that hung high above him suggested that the occupant of the bedroom was a single mom. Either a widow or divorce. All the better, he didn't want to deal with the complications of a guy--

Something caught his attention. Shining his light to the left he saw the biggest pair of leather sandals he'd ever seen in his life. A thought came to his mind and he ran toward them. The sole was a good six or seven feet tall and it was a real struggle on his part to climb up onto it. Once he was on top, Scott began to climb up one of the straps. Just high enough so he could get a good look at the sole of the sandal. The flashlight beam shown down upon the imprints made by huge toes that had to be twice as big as those belonging to the pre teen in the other room, the shapes of the toes were similar but more refined as whatever made those indentations clearly adult.

But where was she?

He didn't have to wait long as he felt the vibrations coming up through the floor. He'd watched Jurassic Park enough times to know what that was.
15311122122.title: The Closet

choices: Climb aboard the slipper.
Stay where he was
153111221221.content:
'Well, THAT went well.' Erin though sarcastically as she stepped into the house. The date had been a disaster. She vowed, as the hung up her dripping wet coat and locked the front door, that it would be the last time she would let anyone talk her into trying an online dating service.

She walked upstairs and checked on her daughter. Fast asleep and holding her old teddy. A habit of hers when it came to thunderstorms since she was very young. Tucking her in she closed the door behind her and headed for her own room. She ran her hair through her wet hair. She needed a warm Bath after all that. As she stepped into her bedroom, she paused for a moment. She had the odd feeling as though someone was there. She turned the lights on and they promptly went back out. Power Outage. So much for that bath. She took a flashlight out and proceeded to check the room. The closet. Under the bed. Nothing.

'Storm must be messing with me.' Erin thought as she pulled her stockings off. ' too many late night horror movies'

Scott watched it all from his place on the sandal. The light of the room that quickly went out and illuminated the room, but also the figure that stood in the doorway. She was Blonde. Her hair, which was dripping wet from the rain, hung shoulder length. If he were to guess, and that's all he really could do, she was around 5' 5". She wore a dress, Scott assumed she had just come back from a date. A bad date judging from the expression. He could see where the pre teen got her looks from. Moments after the lights had gone out he watched her inspect the room with a flashlight as though she might've....

Might've thought someone was there.

There's no way she could've known he was there. Still, to be on the save side, he remained still and his own flashlight was off. After a few minutes of searching she shook her head and began to undress by flashlight. He turned away. It wasn't his place to watch like some perv. He only turned when she walked passed the sandals. A single footfall was enough to knock him flat on his ass. By this time, she was dressed in a nightgown and robe. She put her fuzzy slippers on and paused in front of the sandals to look at the storm. To Scott, it was as though she was inviting him to hop aboard.

He made his decision quickly.
153111221221.title: She is coming

choices: Erin Feels something crawling up her leg
Scott makes it to Erin's lap
Erin begins to feel drowsy
Erin sees Scott but thinks she's seeing things.
1531112212211.content:
Accent. acceleration forward, decent, impact. Rinse and repeat.

Those were the forces Scott was dealing with as he hung to the synthetic fur of the woman's slipper. To the woman, her pace was slow, tired. For Scott every impact with the floor, a single footstep, threatened to shake him free.

Not feeling like going to bed right away, and not wanting to take a bath by flashlight, Erin walked downstairs into the kitchen and thought for a moment. Normally she'd get her self a bowl of lucky charms or some other comfort food, but after that date she needed something a bit stronger. She got herself a glass, the opened the fridge and took out the wine. The bottle of wine had been in her fridge for a year, maybe longer, and this would be her third drink from it. So she wasn't exactly what you'd call a heavy drinker. As a matter of fact, the single glass was enough to make her feel giddy and a little tipsy. She needed that after tonight.

With her Glass in her hand Erin walked into the living room and sat on the couch, placing her feet on the coffee table.She took her first sip, felt the slightly burning sensation of the alcohol and the warm feeling it gave her. She smiled and listened to the storm raging outside. She knew her daughter was upstairs doing the same. She'd check in on her later.

Scott's grip had finally failed when the woman propped her feet up onto the coffee table. He was laying face first on her bare ankle, his heart racing a mile a minute. He though for sure she had felt him. He though any moment he'd be swatted like a bug. He slowly raised his head. Looking past the curve of the shin and the thigh and up the length of her body to her face he saw that he hadn't been noticed at all. The woman stared straight a head slowly sipping the contents of a glass she held. Scott sniffed. Wine. Slowly he rose to his feet. He still hadn't been noticed.

Scott thought about his options, maybe he could climb onto the coffee table, but what good would that do? He'd just be stuck on the coffee table. So his only other option would be to make his way the length of his woman's bare shin to her robe. Get close enough to her ear, maybe get her attention. He began to slowly walk the length of the shin.
1531112212211.title: A stiff Drink

choices: She picks you out from her toes
Slip her feet into her skechers twinkle toe sneakers
Walk into the kitchen to get breakfast
153111222.content:
Gently, you caressed the giant, smelly sole of the 5 year old girl. Careful not to disturb her slumber this time. Her feet were well developed for being a child. Not stubby and pudgy like a typical child in her age group, but actually nicely shaped and smelled like a grown woman's foot odor. It reminded you of your Ex-girlfriends feet after she got off working long hours as a nurse at the local hospital.

You took a whiff of the stink emitting from her soles once more, smells like heaven. You cannot believe you are getting into little girl feet. At your size however, nothing is little about them at all.

Yawning, you decide to take an nap as well and cuddle between her toes. The girl is such a sleepy head, she does not feel the tiny bug sized man wedge himself between her tootsies. You tolerate the odor enough to fall asleep, nothing compared to the stink of adult feet which you have sadly smelled many times from grown men/women.....


You are suddenly jolted awake from sleep, this happens so fast you are not able to comprehend the situation, The girl is awake and about to get into motion, unaware for now of the tiny man stuck between her toes! You scream as she stomps in her room for a minute, What does she do now?!
153111222.title: The tiny weirdo

choices: Scott decides it's time to leave
Scott decides to climb up onto the sole of her foot
The Foot suddenly kicked toward him
Karen suddenly climbs out of bed
Suddenly the covers are pulled away
153111224.content:
The Bed suddenly shook violently. Scott dropped the flashlight and watched it bounce away from him. He didn't start breathing again until the Bedquake had subsided. He looked about in the darkness, searching for his flashlight. He found it moments later and shined it in the direction of the Preteen's feet.

They now lay Horizontal. The quake had been the Giantess rolling over on her side. He looked the feet over and decided to get close again.

The toes, which were previously out of his reach, were now easier to make out. They weren't quite slender but they weren't chubby either. They looked powerful too. An odd way to describe a toe, but when that toe was four times your size it could look pretty damn powerful. Walking around them Scott shone his flashlight on the toe nails revealing chipped pink nail polish. He walked back to the ball of the foot and thought for a moment, then--
153111224.title: Karen rolls over on her side

choices: Scott's in the bowl
Scott avoided the bowl and landed in on the coffee table.
Scott manages to hang on
153112.content:
Young Karen walked down stairs to the living room. It was Saturday morning and cartoons were on TV. She held her favorite stuffed toy with out a care in the world, and wasn't even aware of the hitch hiker she'd picked up along the way. For the most part Scott was doing all he could to hang on to the fabric that made up the young girl's shirt, it would've been easier of the kid didn't bounce about so much. Upon reaching the living room Karen headed straight for the coffee table. Her mother had prepared breakfast and on Saturdays let her eat in front of the TV.

Today her breakfast consisted of a Bowl of cereal and Orange Juice. As she leaned over her breakfast to grab the TV remote, she hadn't noticed her hitch hiker loose his grip on her shirt, nor did she see him fall toward her breakfast below. Turning the TV on, she hopped onto the sofa and picked up her bowl of Cereal.
153112.title: downstairs to play.

choices: Another Spoonful
Karen finally felt something in her mouth
Karen is about to drink some orange juice.
1531121.content:
The milk was freezing cold. That was the first thing Scott registered as he plunged into the white ocean that was the cereal bowl. Fighting for air and swimming blindly he kicked what he hoped was upward and broke the surface. Gasping for breath he wiped the milk from his eyes.

Karen looked into the cereal bowl with eager anticipation. It was her favorite breakfast cereal and unlike some other kids she liked to eat her favorite foods slowly to enjoy every bite.

Scott gazed up at the face that looked down at him but not at him. He cried out to her as he held onto a floating bit of cereal. If the TV hadn't been on, she might of just barely heard him. But Fate had other ideas. He saw her spoon come into view. Then there was a huge wave of milk as she scooped up her first soon full. Her focus changed to the TV as the spoon ascended upwards and he watched her jawline move up and down as she slowly chewed. She glanced back down to the bowl only to repeat the process, and she resumed watching TV.

Karen had eaten about four spoon fulls of her favorite cereal without knowing she had a tiny person in her breakfast. On the fifth spoonful he was scooped up along with the cereal he was clinging onto. She held the spoon momentarily to her mouth as she laughed at what was on TV.

Her giggles vibrated over him as Scott gazed at the huge mouth before him. He noted the dimples on her cheeks as she smiled and laughed. Her warm humid breath blew over him smelling of cereal and milk. Then her mouth opened wider, her tongue dropped as the spoon slid forward. He could hear the spoon scrap over her teeth as it entered her mouth. The tongue lifted as the mouth closed and he was in Darkness. He suddenly found himself on her tongue as she started to chew.

Had she been paying attention Karen would've felt something unusual as she started to chew. She would've felt tiny hands grab onto tastebuds as her tongue pushed cereal bits onto her teeth. Instead she went "MMMMMM" as she began to chew.

It was chaos in the darkness. with every Crunch the cereal around him was turned to paste. Scott grabbed desperately at the tongue under him but he knew it wouldn't be enough. He had screamed for help, for the girl to stop, but his cries had fallen on ears too big to hear him. The only reason he had even been able to hang on was because the chewing process was slow. Even then it was becoming more difficult with every chew.

Suddenly Scott was shoved up toward the hard upper pallet and there was a suction followed by his ears popping as the air pressure changed.

Gulp.

He hadn't been swallowed, but that didn't mean it couldn't still happen. Then the mouth lite up as it opened once more.
1531121.title: Fighting for life in a Child's breakfast.

15311211.content:
Scott did the only thing he could think of to do, he ran for the opening. Leaping past the front teeth and over the lips, Scott fell and near instantly was covered in cold milk again as the girl laughed. "I can't have landed in the bowl again that fast..." Scott thought as he kicked up to the surface. As he broke the surface and looked around, he froze in horror as he realized the reason... he had fallen directly into the Karen rising spoon.

Unable to do anything as Karen's massive mouth grinned and giggled, the cave of death Scott had just escapes opened up to receive him once more. "NO! STOOOOP!" Scott screamed as loud as he could, but the little girl wasn't paying attention and probably couldn't hear or see him if she was anyway. The spoon with Scott on it went past the lips, over the teeth, and laid on the tongue. An ungodly loud screeching, happening on a scale far too small for the girl to be able to hear was all Scott could himself hear as the girl pulled the spoon out of her mouth scrapping the spoon against her teeth.

Flakes of cereal were pulled off the spoon in an avalanche before Scott could move. "Oh god no!!!" Scott screamed as flakes much larger than him fell upon him. Buried under and between flakes of cereal far too big for Scott to move, all Scott could go was wait as the inevitable happened.

MUNCH!!! The chewing began. Unable to move, Scott could only watch and scream his lungs out as the flakes of cereal were gradually and tortuously slowly ground up. At first between the flakes and the darkness Scott couldn't see anything, but with each bite the few flakes Scott was trapped in moved closer and closer to Karen's terrifying teeth and gradually unobstructed his view.

CRUNCH... MUNCH... CRUNCH... The teeth were massive and white, calling them guillotines or car crushers would be greatly understating their size. "DON'T EAT ME!!!" Scott screamed, his voice getting hoarse from all the pointless yelling. CRUNCH... CRUNCH... CRUNCH... "MMMMMMMMMMM!!!!" Scott heard as he drew ever closer, and whatever shred of hope he had left abandoned him. All he could do, however loud he could scream, he realized it was all for nothing. Scott watched in silence as more MMMs! and that constant CRUNCH continued.

Finally, the flakes Scott was stuck in were thrown on top of the massive teeth. CRUNCH!!! the teeth barely missed Scott as he watched them, too terrified to so much as cry out. Karen's greedy tongue moved Scott to what to her was millimeters, but it was enough. Scott looked up at the teeth as MUNCH!!! the flakes and Scott with it were mercilessly crushed.

The unaware killer smiled at the funny people on TV. Swallowing her bite, "Mmmm..." Karen licked and smacked her lips as she scooped up another spoonful of cereal. "Yum!"
15311211.title: Scott. Part of a balanced breakfast

choices: A bug
A human
15311212.content:
Karen's tongue moved around, tasting the cereal, and the cold milk. While tasting, her tongue detected something odd. She isolated it, you, on one side of her mouth. Swallowing the cereal and milk down, leaving you alone, she spits you out.

What does she see?
15311212.title: Karen finally felt something in her mouth

15311213.content:
Scott was suddenly blinded by light as the Preteen opened her mouth. Then, as his eyes adjusted, he saw what was coming.

"N---!"

That was all he was able to say before a title wave of orange juice poured over the lower teeth and struck him. Lost in the flow he tumbled back and prayed for a quick end as he instinctively knew where he was going. The tongue dipped down, the throat opened up as the tongue lifted up again and...

*Gulp Gulp*

Karen took two drinks of her orange juice and continued to watch her cartoons. She finished her cereal, drank the last of her juice and walked to the kitchen to place the dishes in the sink. All the while not knowing, and never knowing, that a micro human being was meeting his end inside her. That's for the best of course. His body was processed and the best components became apart of her. In the days to come,an odd matchbox car would be found. Too fragile to be played with, it spent many years on a shelf before eventually being thrown away.
15311213.title: Swallowed

choices: Karen takes Scott to her Mother
Karen decides to take care of Scott by herself
Scott attempts to make introductions
A few months later
1531122.content:
Normally falling from hundreds of feet to a hard surface would mean instant death, and for Scott it certainly felt like it as he felt the impact onto the unforgiving wood of the coffee table. There was a flash of red and then he was aware of nothing as he lost conscious.

Karen sat down on the couch and watched her cartoons while she enjoyed her bowl of cereal. Her mother may not have approved, but since her mother wasn't around she placed her feet up onto the coffee table. She almost brought her right heel down onto Scott's unconscious body. Karen watched her cartoon's and enjoyed her breakfast. Some time later she had drank the last of the milk from her bowl and was about to get up and drop the dishes off at the kitchen, when something caught her eye. Taking her feet off the coffee table she peered closer.

Karen wasn't what you'd call the average kid who thought everything tiny was a bug and be freaked out about it. In fact it was very rare that she'd be freaked out by any insect. So when she peered closer and got a good look, she knew immediately that this was no bug. It was obvious to her that this was a tiny person. A tiny person that wasn't moving. She thought about picking it up between her fingers, but was afraid she might crush it. So she carefully nudged the unmoving form over the edge of the coffee table and into her cupped hand.

She carried it up to her bedroom where she had a magnifying glass. Upon further examination she was relieved to find It, He, was still breathing. Where did he come from? Where there anymore? What was she to do with the one she had?

Scott Ached all over. Clearly the fall hadn't killed him even though it should have. The warmth radiating from underneath him felt good on his aches and---

What was he laying on?

He opened his eyes and found himself staring eye to eye with the child he'd fallen from. He was in her hand, and she was looking at him with a look of relief and concern. Relief that he was okay, but concern as she wasn't sure what to do next. To be honest Scott didn't really know either.
1531122.title: Hard landing.

choices: Scott waits until later
Scott tries now
Karen Feels an itch in her ear
1531123.content:
How Scott managed to hold on as the preteen sat down he had no idea. If she had landed with a bit more force he would've ended up in her bowl of cereal for sure. Speaking of which, he watched as a spoonful entered the preteen's mouth. She chewed slowly watching the antics of Bugs Bunny and Daffy Duck. Ironically it was the Jack and the Beanstalk skit.

He needed help, and this kid was his only option. He looked up further as she ate another mouthful of cereal. She had shoulder length hair. If he could make it to her shoulder, and then climb up her hair, he could make it to her ear.

He began climbing. Listening to the sounds of chewing, cartoons, the occasional giggle, and laugh. Reaching her shoulder was tough, but Scott found out that climbing rope like strands of hair wasn't as easy as he though it would be. There was an oiliness to the follicles that made climbing difficult. It slowed him down but eventually he found himself closer to his goal. It was an nicely shaped ear, as far as ears go, with a gold stud in the lobe. He swung back and fourth on the follicle he clung to until he was close enough to jump. He landed in the cup of the Ear, not far from the enternce to the inner ear.

The preteen didn't seem to have noticed as she tipped the bowl and drank down the last of the milk. Scott inched his way closer to the inner ear and wondered what he should do next. After all, he'd never done anything like this in his life. Should he yell into the inner ear now, or wait until the cartoons were over so there would be no distractions?
1531123.title: Scott manages to hang on

choices: Scott makes a landing on the bed
Scott lands in the Blond Girl's bangs (Lori)
Scott lands face first onto one girl's shirt (Jill)
Scott  Lands in one girls pony tail (Cassie)
Scott lands on the floor at their feet.
153113.content:
11 year old Karen walked over to her toy box and took out her favorite stuffed toy. The bear had been hers since she was a toddler. Though normally she didn't sleep with a stuffed animals anymore today the old bear would serve a different purpose. She was on her way to her first sleepover at her friends house. Including Karen there would be three other girls. Cassie, her cousin Jill, and Lori. All of them agreed to bring a doll or bear that they slept with when they were younger. A sort of show and tell. Placing the bear next to her PJs and change of clothing she zipped up her duffle bag.

Scott was rocked like crazy as the child picked up the duffle bag and Hop, skipped, and jumped all the way from the bedroom to the waiting car. Thankful not to be jostled about for the moment he had no idea where this preteen was taking him but based on what he could see he had a pretty good idea. He didn't have a good feeling about it.

The rumble of the car stopped, the was the sound of a door opening and a woman's voice saying "Have fun Dear." before Scott's prison was picked up and moving again. There was a brief pause as a door bell was wrung and then there came new voices. Young excited voices.

He REALLY didn't have a good feeling about it. More movement. More rocking about. From what he could hear they were making plans for tonight. Ordered Pizza and some popcorn with a movie, followed by games.

Scott clearly knew he needed help, but he'd rather get it from a grown adult than a bunch of kids. But did he have a choice? Not really. Then the Duffle bag came to a stop. There was a sound of the zipper opening and light filled his prison. Still on the Bear, Scott wished he'd gotten off a while back. He looked up into four giant faces.

One was the girl from before, but the other three who stood behind her were new to him. As for their ages, Scott could only guess that they were all about the same age. One was blond with dark blue eyes, as she smiled dimples formed on her cheeks. The other two were brunette and Scott was fairly certain they were related somehow.

"See? I brought him."


Karen reached in with two hands and pulled out the bear which she promptly tossed onto the bed next to the other plush dolls. What she and her friends failed to notice was Scott, who at the same time found himself air born in a failed attempt to get off the bear. He followed behind the Bear in an arc that would take him over the heads of the three girls. Then he noticed as he tumbled that his accent upward was tapering off, he might not be sailing over their heads after all.
153113.title: To a sleepover with her friends

choices: Kelly sees Scott (First thinks he's a toy)
Karen sees Scott
Karen pulls out her teddy (Scott stays in the duffle Bag)
Karen and Kelly leave the room Suddenly (Pizza)
Karen removes the wrapped Gift (Scott jumps onto the bow)
153114.content:
11 year old Karen walked over to her toy box and took out her favorite stuffed toy. The bear had been hers since she was a toddler. Though normally she didn't sleep with a stuffed animals anymore today was a special occasion. She her cousin Kelly's Birthday and she was going over to her house for a sleepover. Karen and Kelly had more in common than just their names both starting with "K". Being first cousins, they were also the same age with Kelly being born three days after Kelly. From the very beginning they were inseparable. The Best of Friends. Kelly was a bit taller than Karen and a bit pudgier but her mother insisted that it was just baby fat.

Placing the bear next to her PJs ,a few smaller dolls, and a wrapped gift she zipped up her duffle bag.

Scott was rocked to and fro as the preteen picked up the duffle bag and walked from her bedroom to the waiting car. Thankful not to be jostled about for the moment as while the car drove to it's destination, he still had no idea where this preteen was taking him. Based on what he could see though he had a pretty good idea. He was regretting leaving his car.

Speaking of cars, the car he was currently in as an unwanted passenger rumbled rumbled to the stop. There was the sound of a door opening and a woman's voice saying "Have fun Dear." before Scott's prison was picked up and was moving again. There was a brief pause as a door bell was wrung and then there came a new voice. A Young excited voice.

It didn't exactly help his feeling of dread that was continuing to grow. More movement. More rocking about. From what he could hear Karen and this new Giant were making plans for tonight. Pizza followed by cake and presents . Later popcorn and a movie.

When the Duffel Bag came to a stop Scott looked up in time to see the Zipper open up and light filled his prison once more.
153114.title: To a sleepover with her cousin

info.brief_description: You try to survive ant size in a Gigantic Parallel Universe.
info.description:
You play as a young man named Scott. Coming back home from a long road trip with stories of your travels to tell your friends and Family, but your travels are not over. While driving home a Mysterious Portal opens up, sending you to a world that is your own-- but gigantic in proportions. What will happen to you in this new world is completely up to you, but there are a few ground rules.

1) No one sentence chapters. Unless its a choice. And even then don't have six chapters in a row that's just "How About?" I've seen that enough and if there's too many I'll have to remove them or add to them. Try to put in at least one paragraph.

2) Though the interactive has an 18+ rating, Chapters don't necessarily need to be. Write within your comfort level.

3) Nothing involving the main Character getting Peed on, or crapped on or involving a toilet, or farting. But everything else (Feet, vore, unaware, etc) is fine.

4) He can encounter anyone--but if it's a Kid NO sexual interaction. But everything else (Feet, vore, unaware, mistaken for a bug or toy,etc) is fine. You can save the sexual stuff for any adult characters or characters over 18.

5) This is my first Non- Furry interactive but if you want to put in a furry character go right ahead. Animals are okay too if there happens to be a family pet or neighborhood dog on the loose or whatever you can come up with.

I guess that's about it then.
